For the tomato and avocado salad: ¼ avocado, stone removed, peeled and sliced

steps: For the soused sardines, place the vinegar, wine, cloves and bay leaf into a pan and bring to the boil. Add the sardine fillets and simmer for 2-3 minutes, or until cooked through.
For the tomato and avocado salad, place all of the salad ingredients into a bowl and mix well.
To serve, place the tomato and avocado salad onto a plate, top with the soused sardines and pour over the cooking juices. Garnish with dill.
title: Soused sardines with tomato and avocado salad
